thread.title: Great value for money - perfect location
thread.title_full: Great value for money - perfect location - Review of Hotel Belleclaire, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Mapengobis
title: Great value for money - perfect location
text: We loved this hotel. Perfect location, close enough to Lincoln Center, Broadway, Central Park, Times Square etc., and still in a quiter area. At times we had some noise of the street, but it was really quite OK compared to other hotels we stayed in, and also the price was very reasonable. Enough space in the rooms for just leaving your luggage, and sleeping.
